backend/main.mo: Actor providing cached US and India news via HTTP outcalls, refreshing daily and storing results in a Map.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module filtering old cached news to retain only the 'us_general' entry during upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML wrapper loading the React application entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for home, news, and coming-soon pages.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsItemRow: Displays a single news item row with index, headline, and preview text.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsSection: Card component showing a region’s news with loading, empty, and error states using useRegionNewsData.
frontend/src/components/news/TopUSHeadli: Home-page section fetching and displaying top US headlines with parse, loading, error, and empty handling.
frontend/src/config/newsDataSource.ts: Config toggling between demo and backend news sources via a global constant.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, storing identity state, and handling AuthClient creation and lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react‑query hooks for fetching and refreshing region news through the backend actor, with demo‑mode handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegionNews.ts: Wraps backend news queries with parsing, demo‑mode data, last‑updated tracking, and a helper to refresh all regions.
frontend/src/hooks/useUSNews.ts: Implements react‑query hooks for fetching and refreshing US news from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/news/demoNewsData.ts: Provides deterministic demo news items for all regions for development and testing.
frontend/src/lib/news/parseNews.ts: Parses GNews JSON into normalized news items, handling errors, HTML cleanup, and preview generation.
frontend/src/lib/news/regionConfig.ts: Exports the list of supported regions with IDs, names, and flags.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with react‑query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ComingSoonPage.tsx: Renders a generic 'Coming Soon' UI with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home screen showing header, US headlines, and navigation cards linking to News, Vocabulary, Speaking, and Lessons pages.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: News screen that displays world news by region with refresh controls and demo mode handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing news app features, known issues, and pending feature requests related to regional news loading.
